description:
Finally, the time has come... With only Natsu, Erza, and Jellal left in the Tower of Heaven, Etherion comes raining down! But in the instant everyone cries out for the victims, something amazing occurs! The outside of the tower is destroyed, revealing it to be a giant lacrima! The council had been used by Jellal in his fiendish plot! The unbelievable truth behind Jellal will be revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Give Our Prayers to the Sacred Light
Une prière pour la lumière sainte
